speak;Emma; Hey Kate! How're you and your griffin doing?
speak;Kate; Ah, Emma{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Nice to see you as well.{w} I'm fine, and so is Solar.
speak;Emma; Solar? Oh, so it's got a name after all?
speak;Kate; My friend is not an "it" under any circumstances.
speak;Emma; You're still cautious of me, aren't you?{w} Even after we helped you with the village?
speak;Kate; I just met you, Emma. I'm not a fool.{w} It'll take more than sad tales of demon attacks and the power of friendship to sway me.

speak;Emma; I wanted to get to know you better{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Listen, I 've been thinking,{w} maybe your soldiers and sister don't listen because you're so strict and stone-hearted.{w} You've got to chill out a bit.
speak;Kate; I've been told that a lot{tgm}...{tgm} But I'm strict for a reason, Emma.
speak;Emma; But for what reason?
speak;Kate; How long do you have?
speak;Emma; As much as it takes.
speak;Kate; Give me a second for this{tgm}...
speak;Emma; Take your time. I'm here to listen, Kate.
speak;Kate;...;no_talk

speak;Kate; I was just fourteen. Luna was eight.{w} Our village was{tgm}...{tgm}was raided by this man, Nolan, and his bandit curs.{w} My mother was killed just for trying to protect my sister and me.{w} I couldn't let Luna get hurt, so I raised a sword against Nolan{tgm}...{tgm}{w} He just{tgm}...{tgm}laughed, before cutting a hole into my stomach with his axe.{w} I still have the scar to this day.{w} Since then, I've thought about nothing but cleaving Nolan's head from his neck,{w} so I could mount it on a pike as a warning for all bandits.
speak;Emma; I suddenly don't feel so safe being on the same boat as this woman...;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
speak;Kate;...;no_talk
speak;Kate; I'm sorry, that might've been a bit too frank and personal.

speak;Emma; Kate{tgm}...{tgm}I don't know who my real mother is,{w} but I do know what it's like to watch loved ones die.{w} You're not alone, and there's still your friends and sister.{w} You wouldn't want Luna on the same path as you, right?
speak;Kate; I guess you're right{tgm}...
speak;Kate; I just didn't want any corruption left to have the opportunity to take her from me{tgm}...
speak;Emma; You can't kill every bandit.
speak;Kate; But I can die trying, and if it'd make the world safer for Luna,{w} then I'd lay down my life every time.
speak;Emma;I-I see{tgm}...
speak;Kate; Thanks for listening, Emma, but{tgm}...{tgm} I need to go clear my head.{w} And you should go get ready for lookout duty.
